Package org.apache.hadoop.hbase.replication.regionserver

Class ReplicationObserver

java.lang.Object
org.apache.hadoop.hbase.replication.regionserver.ReplicationObserver
All Implemented Interfaces:
Coprocessor, RegionCoprocessor, RegionObserver
@Private public class ReplicationObserver extends Object implements RegionCoprocessor, RegionObserver
An Observer to add HFile References to replication queue.

    • preCommitStoreFile

      public void preCommitStoreFile(ObserverContext<RegionCoprocessorEnvironment> ctx, byte[] family, List<Pair<org.apache.hadoop.fs.Path,org.apache.hadoop.fs.Path>> pairs) throws IOException
      Description copied from interface: RegionObserver
      Called before moving bulk loaded hfile to region directory.
      Specified by:
      preCommitStoreFile in interface RegionObserver
      Parameters:
      ctx - the environment provided by the region server
      family - column family
      pairs - List of pairs of { HFile location in staging dir, HFile path in region dir } Each pair are for the same hfile.
      Throws:
      IOException
